title: Historic English Country Mansion Stay with Daily Breakfast, a Decadent Dinner & Afternoon Tea
description: Escape the hustle and bustle and experience a quintessential English getaway in Reading, a charming city in the Berkshire countryside. Only 40 minutes from central London you will find an elegant estate with an impressive heritage, De Vere Wokefield Estate: the ultimate destination for a luxurious country escape. With a PGA-standard 18-hole golf course at your fingertips, beautifully appointed rooms and over 250 acres of lush parkland to admire, you are set to experience an unforgettable countryside retreat with daily continental breakfast, a decadent three-course a la carte dinner and a traditional afternoon tea for two.
offer_address: Goodboy's Ln, Mortimer Common, Reading RG7 3AE, UK

title: Charming Mansion Escape in the English Countryside
description: Escape the city and experience a quintessential English getaway in the Berkshire countryside. Only 40 minutes from central London but miles away from the bustle, the recently-refurbished De Vere Wokefield Estate is the ultimate getaway nestled amid vibrant rolling hills and quaint country towns. Enjoy a three, four or five-night stay with daily continental breakfast, a decadent three-course a la carte dinner for two and an afternoon tea for two.
offer_address: Goodboy's Ln, Mortimer Common, Reading RG7 3AE, UK

title: Elegant British Getaway in the Idyllic County of Berkshire
description: Leave the bustling streets of London behind to discover the many charms of Berkshire's picturesque town of Reading, located just 25 minutes by train from Paddington Station. Experience an ultra-luxe stay at the Roseate Hotel, dubbed as the ‘The UK's Sexiest Townhouse Hotel’ enjoying daily full English breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival and a traditional afternoon tea during your stay, as you unwind amid the stunning Royal Berkshire countryside.

title: Reading Retreat Overlooking the Iconic River Thames
description: Within walking distance of Reading Station and the town centre, Crowne Plaza Reading, an IHG Hotel, sits peacefully alongside southern England's iconic River Thames. With an indoor infinity pool, fully-equipped fitness centre, indulgent onsite spa, lavish Riverside restaurant and garden, and service typical of the world-renowned Crowne brand, this hotel will enchant you from the moment you arrive. If you can tear yourself away, there's picturesque walks along the Thames to further unwind.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Reading, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Caversham Bridge, Richfield Ave, Reading RG1 8BD, United Kingdom

title: UK Stylish Reading Sanctuary Overlooking River Loddon with Spa
description: Take in the green fields and nature reserves of the charming country village of Winnersh with a stay at Crowne Plaza Reading East, an IHG Hotel. Immerse yourself in this quaint Berkshire town or spend a day at nearby Ascot Racecourse. Reset your mind and body with a spa treatment at Esprit Wellness & Spa, peruse creative cocktails served on the terrace as you gaze at landscaped gardens, or indulge in modern British and Indian cuisine at Caprice Restaurant & Terrace.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Reading East, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Wharfedale Road, Reading RG41 5TS, United Kingdom

title: Boutique Reading Townhouse Luxury near London
description:
There’s good reason The Roseate Reading was dubbed the ‘UK’s Sexiest Townhouse Hotel’ by the Evening Standard. Pass through the doors of the historic red-brick building to discover interiors that are just as grand as the façade: chandeliers dripping with Italian glass beads, vaulted ceilings, elaborate wood carvings and crackling fireplaces all contribute to an atmosphere of cosy, art-inspired luxury, complemented by paintings and sculptures sourced from around the world.

Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, the hotel is nestled conveniently between London and the Oxfordshire countryside, a fabulous base for exploring southern England. See the sights of the Big Smoke, indulge in a luxury shopping spree at the world-famous Bicester Village, lose yourself in the charming Cotswolds villages, visit the dreaming spires of Oxford University, or make the short 30-minute drive to Heston Blumenthal's world-famous restaurant, The Fat Duck. You might even venture down to seaside Brighton, just a 1.5-hour drive away. Back at your hotel, relax in boutique splendour and treat yourself to a blissful spa treatment, European cuisine or traditional British afternoon tea.

title: Stylish Reading Escape near London & Windsor Castle
description: Enjoy the best of both worlds with a stay at the stylish voco Reading, an IHG Hotel, just 25 minutes from London by train. As the gateway to the idyllic Berkshire countryside, this buzzy town is packed with charm, beautiful buildings, perfectly manicured gardens and historical gems. Explore the nearby Madejski Stadium, Green Park, Legoland or Windsor Castle, or simply relax at your well-equipped hotel.
offer_address: Select Car Leasing Stadium, Reading, RG2 0FL
